strings.otherOverviewDetail: Preparedness for Effective Response (PER) is a cyclical approach designed to empower National Societies to become more creative and innovative in their disaster management actions, and contribute to the coordination of national and global response systems.
strings.rapidResponseDetail: Details about the expectations for this specialty can be found in the role profiles:
strings.otherLinkOne: Rapid Response Preparedness for Effective Response Coordinator role profile.
strings.otherLinkTwo: Rapid Response National Society Preparedness for Effective Response Officer role profile.
